text: Sargath leads his mounted reavers in a lightning-fast charge, trampling enemies beneath the hooves of his warhorse and leaving chaos in their wake.
In a frenzied state of bloodlust, Sargath and his mounted reavers charge recklessly into enemy lines, dealing massive damage and instilling fear in their hearts.
Sargath offers sacrifices to Slaanesh, gaining favor with the Dark Prince and unlocking powerful blessings and boons for his armies.
Sargath's presence exerts a corrupting influence on neighboring regions, spreading Chaos corruption and weakening the resolve of enemy forces.

Sargath's presence on the battlefield stirs the desires of his followers, granting increased morale and combat prowess to nearby allied units.
Sargath's mastery of mounted combat allows him to perform dazzling feats of horsemanship, weaving through enemy ranks with grace and precision while delivering devastating strikes.

With a beguiling whisper, Sargath lures enemy units towards him, disrupting their formations and leaving them vulnerable to his devastating attacks.
He is so vain, he probably thinks this qoute is about him..

Whispering Temptation is a wickedly curved blade wrought from blackened steel, its surface etched with swirling runes of dark enchantment. The hilt is adorned with the sinuous coils of serpents, their jeweled eyes gleaming with unearthly allure. When unsheathed, the blade seems to whisper seductive promises of power and pleasure, ensnaring the minds of all who gaze upon it
Sargath the Vain is a legend amongst people of the Yusak Tribe, leading his mounted reavers as he seeks to sate his unnatural appetites.
When Sargath lifts his Runesword the very skies tear open as whispers linger on the battlefield, maddening foes receptive for Slaanesh.

Sargath the Vain, Horse-lord of the Yurtsak, emerged from the windswept steppes of the Eastern Wastes, his legend preceding him like a shadow cast by the moon. Born under the baleful glow of Chaos, he was raised amidst the thundering hooves of the Yurtsak tribes, where tales of glory and conquest whispered through the shifting sands like echoes of forgotten gods. From an early age, Sargath displayed a hunger for power and pleasure unmatched by his peers, his soul aflame with the insatiable desires of Slaanesh. As he matured, his prowess in battle became legendary, leading his mounted reavers like a tempest upon the plains, each victory fueling his lust for conquest and adoration.
